short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save items you find on the web with the Quinnd save button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save the items you find on the web with the Quinnd save button for your browser.

Just click on the Quinnd button on the upper right the next time you find a product you want to save for later. Collect gift ideas for yourself and loved ones, create wish lists and registries, store and collect items for comparison, and more!
